KnowledgeBase.Title: Example ByteVector isCharName 003
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions:
isType isChar isCharAlphabetic isCharAlphanumeric
isCharLowercase isCharNumeric isCharUppercase isCharWhitespace
isString isText
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords:
Character Alphabetic Object Uppercase Lowercase Name
Underscore Numeric Alphanumeric Name Whitespace

Example.Description:
These examples check if the object is is made up of alphanumeric or underscore
characters. If it is, the function returns true, otherwise, it returns false.

Syntax.Hints:
This function returns false if there are whitespaces between
alphanumeric or underscore characters.
